assessments.status_rationale: No report of the BEA’s October 2025 Core PCE release in today’s news; the deadline is still ahead.
No mention of the Conference Board’s November 2025 Consumer Confidence print; release typically due next week.
Today’s coverage does not provide a confirmed close for the 10Y–2Y spread meeting the threshold.
The performance window runs through 2025-12-31; no comparative return evidence provided today.
No OFAC press release about Iran-related designations is cited in today’s news.
No report of a new CISA Emergency Directive in today’s articles.
No EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report details on a ≥6.0 million barrel draw are referenced.
No CDC FluView update with national ILI at or above 3.0% is mentioned.
November 2025 Nonfarm Payrolls have not been released; today’s news references a delayed September report only.
No definitive ≥$500M acquisition by Apple, Microsoft, Alphabet, Amazon, or Meta is reported.
No AAA national gasoline price update indicating ≤$2.90/gal is provided.
No cited market data on the Brent–WTI front-month spread achieving ≥$5.00.
